start: ^[Marcus]: This fire sure is nice. Honestly, this might be my favorite campground. Mostly because nobody ever comes out this far.

c-0: ^[Marcus]: Heh, yeah. Just us, the trees, and the fire. Kinda peaceful, right?
c-1: ^[Marcus]: Probably the roads. Most cars wouldn't survive that drive in. Fine by me, less people.

c-0: ^[Marcus]: Oh - hey, you guys still up for that hike tomorrow? There's a lake at the end of the trail. Only about an hour walk.
c-1: ^[Marcus]: I was thinking we hit that trail nearby. There's a lake at the end of it. Only about an hour walk.

resHike: ^Sure, but we should probably go to sleep early if we want to do that.

c-0: ^[David]: We should leave in the morning. maybe around 11.
c-1: ^[David]: Agreed. That way we can head out in the morning without feeling like crap.

c-0: ^[David]: Let's get out the hot dogs and some wine, it's dinner time!
